1218400.name: Birds Are Real
1218400.description:
Are Birds Real? - Just another day flying over the city & monitoring the plebs.

Birds Are Real is a flying-based sandbox, where you are a fresh recruit to the B.I.R.D.S. program.
Make your way around town, from the nearby beach, through the local farm to the towering city and even the dog park. 

Featuring:

  • You, the drone operator. 
  • A small world full of people just living their lives under the watchful eyes of the Government. 
  • A multitude of extremely classified Bio-Imitating, Reconnaissance Drones.

Your Mission:

  • Keep the peace. 
  • Take out bad guys. 
  • Convince the public Birds Are Real.
1218400.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
